entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts. She interrupts Professor McGonagall and tries to speak, but is ignored.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts. She ignores Professor Umbridge's interruptions and speaks sternly to Dean Thomas.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student in Harry's class. He hands back Harry's essay, which he had graded with an A.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in Professor McGonagall's class. He receives his graded essay from Seamus and sees that he got an A.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is a student in Professor McGonagall's class. He is warned by Professor McGonagall for mistreating a mouse.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge interrupts Professor McGonagall's lesson, trying to speak and ask a question.
Seamus hands back Harry's graded essay, which he had received from Seamus.
Professor McGonagall warns Dean Thomas for mistreating a mouse during the lesson.
